item.title: US second lady Usha Vance announces she is pregnant with fourth child
item.description: Vance posted on social media that she is looking forward to welcoming a boy in late July.

item.title: Europe to suspend approval of US tariffs deal
item.description: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

item.title: Prison officer jailed for having sex with inmate
item.description: Isabelle Dale had relationships with two prisoners at HMP Coldingley in Surrey, a judge says.

item.title: Jason Statham: I've taken a lot of stunts too far
item.description: The 58-year-old has no inclination to step back from the physical demands of his work and says he's "in for a penny, in for a pound".

item.title: UK defends Chagos deal after Trump calls it 'act of great stupidity'
item.description: The US president says it is "another in a very long line of National Security reasons why Greenland has to be acquired".
